thread.title: Calculator: Find out how the penalty rates cut affects your pay
thread.title_full: Calculator: Find out how the penalty rates cut affects your pay

author: Simon Elvery And Ashlynne McGhee
title: Calculator: Find out how the penalty rates cut affects your pay
text:
By political reporter Ashlynne McGhee and Simon Elvery Updated February 23, 2017 18:36:25 Map: Australia 
The Fair Work Commission has cut Sunday and public holiday penalty rates for some workers. 
It is a complicated decision — 550 pages long — and how it affects your pay depends on the industry you work in and the type of job you have. 
We've done the hard work for you: use our calculator to find out the impact on you. 
Your browser can't display this. Find out more . 
Today's decision only affects people who work in the retail, hospitality or fast food industries. 
The Fair Work Commission made a point of saying it will not affect people who work in other industries. 
The changes to public holiday pay will come into effect on July 1. 
The Fair Work Commission has not yet decided when the Sunday pay cuts will begin, but says it should be in the next year.
